messages.message: how do i go about changing the documentation? I want to modify the redactor app page and add an “Apply Redactor” section to “Add Steps to Flow”.
currently you have to play around and work through the .rst files and their links — you’ll have to go to the apply steps to flow rst file, and then add an rst link in there

for example create-flow.rst has a link to the other step’s rst files: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/instabase/instabase/master/docs/source/content/apps/flow/create-flow.rst?token=AAB2HDDIT7CBUVL2EZMB2425JSBSE
